long_description: Whether you're bound for Moab or Morocco, you'll appreciate the women's Columbia Global Adventure Vest as it blocks harsh sun during the day and adds a little warmth on cool nights. Nylon/elastane fabric offers 2-way comfort stretch for freedom of movement; polyester lining. Omni-Shade(TM) technology delivers outstanding UPF 50 sun protection; high neck provides added coverage. Omni-Shield(TM) fabric finish resists water, camel spit and stains, and dries quickly. Columbia women's Global Adventure Vest features hand pockets, an adjustable drawcord waist and gathers at the neck.
short_description: Whether you're bound for Moab or Morocco, you'll appreciate the women's Columbia Global Adventure Vest as it blocks harsh sun during the day and adds a little warmth on cool nights.
